sourceDesc.bibl:
CAMERON Charles, The baths of the romans explaines, and illustrates with the restotration of Palladio corrected, and improved, London, George Scott, 1772, in fol., fig.
Grande e magnifica opera con 75 tavole, non compreso il frontespizio di Palladio in principio, e gran numero del vignette; il testo Ã¨ in inglese e in francese, il primo in 65, e il secondo in 68 pagine ec. Esemplare in mar. dor.

titleStmt.title: The baths of the Romans explained and illustrated [microform] : with the restorations of Palladio corrected and improved : to which is prefixed, an introductory preface, pointing out the nature of the work, and a dissertation upon the state of the arts during the different periods of the Roman empire / by Charles Cameron architect.

publicationStmt.authority: Leopoldo Cicognara Program (University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign)

monogr.title: The baths of the Romans explained and illustrated [microform] : with the restorations of Palladio corrected and improved : to which is prefixed, an introductory preface, pointing out the nature of the work, and a dissertation upon the state of the arts during the different periods of the Roman empire / by Charles Cameron architect.
